description: This is Peter, a handsome stud who's built like a chiseled statue.  I'm not surprised, as he told Claude, he's in the gym every day, most of the day. I could see Peter using that power to really fuck a new recruit into shape, and I could also imagine him taking a very solid pounding by someone like Trammel, who would be fun to watch work his huge cock into a fresh, hungry recruit like Peter.  It really turned me on seeing Peter's muscles ripple as he gripped and jacked his hard dick.  He has an intensity as he cranks his erection that you can't deny.  I'm hoping Peter will bring that back for us to enjoy.
title: Peter, Scene #01
